note.p: Architect. Son of Thomas Peters and Elizabeth Peters, who was a widow when she lived in Down in the 1850s–1860s. Employed at the War Office, 1861; architect, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/462/73/7), 1871 (RG10/1332/34/58)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 September 2022)
